iati-activity.title: HPMP for post 2015 targets
iati-activity.description: In compliance with the Montreal Protocol, the project’ s objective is to prepare a comprehensive HPMP (Stage-2) for Lebanon, which will incorporate the strategy and action plan for Lebanon for compliance with the post 2015 control targets.

iati-activity.title: International Awareness Campaign
iati-activity.description: The overall aim of the project is to release a film campaign to highlight to the international community the generosity and receptiveness that the Lebanese Hosting Communities demonstrated in helping the Syrians refugees.

iati-activity.title: Media Campaign
iati-activity.description: Launching an International Media Campaign to mobilize support to hosting communities through communicating the urgent need of assistance in order to minimize the adverse effects of the Syrian influx and improve the ability of helping the refugees.

iati-activity.title: LPDC Strategic Plan, Phase 1
iati-activity.description: This project seeks to strengthen the capacity of the LPDC to implement its strategic Plan (2015-2020) that enables the GoL to set up a comprehensive policy on the Palestinian refugee issues

iati-activity.description: The project responds to immediate needs requested by national counterparts at the MoIM and at the same time, the initiation phase will assist the CO in developing a rule of law project that serves for long term purposes
